mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, co.course_id AS courseId, ca.name AS categoryName, co.title AS title, co.price AS price, co.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl FROM cart c JOIN course co ON co.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN category ca ON ca.category_id = co.category_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.cart_id DESC
